definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: By the way, the number of the telephone on your desk is extension 506.
sentences.chinese: 順便說一下，你桌上的電話號碼是分機506。

sentences.english: When you call, ask for extension 3276.
For assistance please call the Library Circulation Desk at extension 15112.
sentences.chinese: 若有疑問歡迎洽詢圖書館出納臺，分機15112。

sentences.english: By contrast, landline phone service can be used via either cordless or corded extension phones.
sentences.chinese: 而固定電話則可以通過佈置分機在各個房間中使用。
他們監聽他的電話分機。

sentences.english: Hello, the extension is busy, please dial another extension number.
sentences.chinese: 你好，分機忙線中，請改撥其他分機號。

sentences.english: Hello, the extension is busy, please dial another extension number.
sentences.chinese: 你好，分機忙線中，請改撥其他分機號。

sentences.english: There are telephone extensions in every office in our company.
sentences.chinese: 在我們公司，每個辦公室裏面都有電話分機。

sentences.english: Please dial extension 1001, they will come to take your clothes and clean them.
sentences.chinese: 請撥分機1001，他們會來拿衣服去清洗。

sentences.english: Coin Counting And Sorter Machine, please contact us with catalogue and price.
sentences.chinese: 求購硬幣清分機，有意者提供產品目錄，報價。

sentences.english: At the recording, press desired extension.
sentences.chinese: 在答錄電話上撥打想要的分機。

sentences.english: Hello this is Quko Shanghai. Please dial the extension number or press "0" for the operator.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎致電上海翹華，請直撥分機號，查號請撥“0”。

sentences.english: All right. No problem. What's your extension?
sentences.chinese: 沒有問題，你的分機號是多少？

sentences.english: I'm not sure of the name, but the extension is 211.
sentences.chinese: 叫什麼名字不太清楚，只知道電話分機是211。

definition: special-purpose phone line or communications link/hotline/special rail line (e.g. between airport and city)/CL:條|条[tiao2]

to call a cab (by phone)/to request a ride (via an app)
